description: This program tests the input values at each voxel for normality using the Anderson-Darling method.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Specifies the name for the output dataset

noexp.title: No exponential conversion flag
noexp.description: Do not convert the A-D statistic to an exponentially distributed value

pval.title: P-value output flag
pval.description: Output the results as a pure (estimated) p-value
